subject: this post by megan marz
body:
![a fragment of text about emily magazine from the linked article which is about the history of internet writing as an aesthetic and literary phenomenon](/letters/images/580.jpg) 

i was honored to be placed in the company of some writers who mean a lot to me in this ~~history~~/~~survey~~/~~testimony~~/~~manifesto~~/~~essay~~ [post](https://longreads.com/2023/10/24/30-years-internet-online-writing/) by [megan marz](https://meganmarz.com/).
